## Form.setValue() method

Set the value of a given block, field

**Signature:**

```typescript
setValue(block: string, field: string, value: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block containing the field. |
|  field | string | The field for which to set the value. |
|  value | any | The value to set. |

**Returns:**

void
